p: A procedure from Zhu et al. [ 43] was used for the determination of total flavonoids with slight modifications. Briefly, 10 µL of the sample extract was mixed with 60 µL ethanol, 10 µL AlCl 3 (10% b/ v), 10 µL potassium acetate (1 M), and 120 µL distilled water. The mixture was added to a 96-well plate, incubated for 30 min at 37 °C, and the absorbance was read at 450 nm. The total flavonoid content was expressed as quercetin equivalent (mg QE/g) by using the calibration curve of quercetin (y = 0.003x − 0.0157, with R 2 = 0.9935).
